snippet: Beppe Grillo, who was barred from Italy’s state television channels for his political comedy, announced plans to press for sweeping reform of the public broadcaster RAI through new legislation.
abstract: Beppe Grillo, who was barred from Italy’s state television channels for his political comedy, announced plans to press for sweeping reform of the public broadcaster RAI through new legislation.

headline.main: Comparing Italian TV to 'The Truman Show,' Italian Blogger Calls for Sweeping Reform
